schema.description: This metric assesses the originality of the data based on how it was generated.

New Data from Human.description: Original content created entirely from scratch by human contributors. It is not translated, adapted, or derived from pre-existing material.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 2.1').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered newly created by humans.

New Data from Model.description: Original content generated entirely by AI or machine learning models without reference to or transformation of existing data.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 2.2').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered newly generated by a model.

Human Translation.description: Data produced by translating content from another language through human translators.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 3.1').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered human-translated.

Machine Translation.description: Data generated by translating content from another language using machine translation systems.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 3.2').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered machine-translated.

Collated.description: Data collected or aggregated from existing sources without significant modification.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 4.1').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered collated.

Derived.description: Data based on existing sources, with some modifications, transformations, or adaptations applied.

is_applicable.description: Set to true if this applies to the dataset. If true, reference and reasoning must be provided.

reference.description: Location in the paper where this is stated (e.g., 'Section 4.2').

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data is considered derived.

N/A.description: The data source or method of generation is not specified or documented.

is_applicable.description: Set to true only if no other categories apply and the origin is not documented.

reasoning.description: Explanation based on the paper content justifying why the data origin is considered unknown.
